scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint:lockfile" "npm run lint:tsconfig" "npm run lint:js" "npm run lint:pkg-json" "npm run lint:css"
scripts.lint:php: docker run -it --rm --name my-running-script -v "$PWD":/usr/src/myapp -w /usr/src/myapp php:8.2-cli ./vendor/bin/phpcs -s --runtime-set ignore_warnings_on_exit true --standard=phpcs.xml --extensions=php ./inc wapuugotchi.php
scripts.lint:php:fix: docker run -it --rm --name my-running-script -v "$PWD":/usr/src/myapp -w /usr/src/myapp php:8.2-cli ./vendor/bin/phpcbf --runtime-set ignore_warnings_on_exit true --standard=phpcs.xml --extensions=php ./inc wapuugotchi.php
scripts.dev-start: npm run wp-env -- start && npm run watch
scripts.cli: npm run wp-env -- run cli bash

config.js_sources: build inc/avatar/src/avatar.js inc/shop/src/shop.js inc/quest/src/quest.js inc/onboarding/src/onboarding.js inc/alive/src/alive.js inc/mission/src/mission.js inc/quiz/src/quiz.js inc/hunt/src/hunt.js
